name: @semantest/extension
description: Browser extension for Semantest - AI automation extension built on Semantest framework

scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json build/ && cp -r assets build/ && cp src/*.html build/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.package: npm run build && cd build && zip -r ../semantest-extension.zip .
scripts.validate: node -e "const m=require('./build/manifest.json'); console.log('âœ… Extension:', m.name, 'v' + m.version)"
